style_guide.visual_style: High-quality Korean webtoon style with clean digital illustration, soft natural colors, expressive faces, modern fashion, atmospheric lighting
style_guide.segment_story: This is a vocabulary teaching song showing the journey of romance through key Korean relationship terms. Two adorable bunnies (one male, one female) in cute children's book style illustrate each concept - from falling in love, through dating and becoming a couple, experiencing physical affection and the 'something' stage, to the bittersweet emotions of longing, one-sided love, and breakup. The bunnies act out each relationship milestone in a sweet, educational manner.
